blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Learned about the value of observability and connecting to a Prometheus data source
- Verified that your Prometheus server is capturing metrics
- Entered the URL and credentials of a Prometheus server
- Selected a private data source connection and tested the connection
- Verified that metrics appear in Grafana Drilldown Metrics

**Related paths**

Consider taking the following journey after you complete this journey:

- [Explore data using Metrics Drilldown](/docs/learning-paths/drilldown-metrics/)

**More to explore (optional)**

The world is your oyster! Read more about how you can add other data sources that support metrics:

- [AWS CloudWatch](/docs/grafana-cloud/connect-externally-hosted/data-sources/aws-cloudwatch/)
- [Azure Monitor](/docs/grafana-cloud/connect-externally-hosted/data-sources/azure-monitor/)
- [Google Cloud Monitoring](/docs/grafana-cloud/connect-externally-hosted/data-sources/google-cloud-monitoring/)
- [Graphite](/docs/grafana-cloud/connect-externally-hosted/data-sources/graphite/)
- [InfluxDB](/docs/grafana-cloud/connect-externally-hosted/data-sources/influxdb/)
